ygData.subject: Re: Corpse Bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Getting technical on you - you zone three times to get into Befallen.  I did zone (I didn t camp out IN Befallen - but just outside its zone boundary) and
ygData.messageBody:
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> Or you can zone out and zone back in.
>
> The question I have is did *you* also zone out and come back,
> and when did the corpse appear in a new location for you?
> Every time I've run across this bug, I've been the one to
> re-zone first, and thus I end up seeing the corpse while the
> others don't (and it's always been their corpse, not mine).
> I don't know if it works the other way.
>
> --

Getting technical on you - you zone three times to get into Befallen. I did
zone (I didn't camp out IN Befallen - but just outside its zone boundary)
and come back and the body was unreachable (However - never zoned in and out
while remaining online). There definitely was no change until he Camped out
and came back. However - he did NOT try zoning out and back into Befallen
after we discovered the bug. Also note that there were several other people
in the group as well (if that makes a difference) And once again this was
many months ago - so the code could have changed dramatically since then.

Bottom line though - we have a bunch of good suggestions - have the victim
zone in and out - party members zone in and out - try logging in and out -
and then pray to your appropriate God that you can get a guide or GM...

Slyde
